author: julesjuul

preferences.name: commitFormat
preferences.title: Commit Format
preferences.description: Customizes the format of the commit. The available parameters are {type}, {scope}, and {message}. Use \ to remove the following character when no scope is present. Leave blank to revert to the default format.

preferences.name: bodyFormat
preferences.title: Body Format
preferences.description: Customizes the format of the body. The available parameters are {scope}, {body}. Leave blank to revert to the default format.

" && exit 1
